actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Electronic Fund Transfer Act to provide that certain provisions of such Act shall take effect on June 10, 1979, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Changes the effective date of the Electronic Fund Transfer Act to June 10, 1979. Amends the Right to Financial Privacy Act of 1978 to require government authorities, rather than financial institutions, to notify customers of their rights under such Act. States that such notification must be given only when the Act requires any other customer notice.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Electronic Fund Transfer Act to provide that certain provisions of such Act shall take effect on June 10, 1979, and for other purposes.
